game.title: The Mysterious Adventure
game.objective: Unravel the Mystery of the Sunken Galleon
game.description: In this quest, you embark on a perilous journey to uncover the sunken treasure of an infamous pirate. Follow the clues, crack ciphers, and overcome perils to locate the hidden wealth.
game.reward: 500 gold coins plus a unique artifact
